title: 2020 NFL Draft Focus: New Year's Day Bowl Preview, CFP Semis Recap (Football 1/1)
description:
Ryan Wilson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Draft writer Chris Trapasso to talk all things draft with a focus on bowl season in college football. The guys evaluate performances from the College Football Playoff Semifinals over the weekend (2:45) and how the draft stock could be affected for top prospects from LSU, Oklahoma, Clemson and Ohio State. Then, Ryan and Chris preview the New Year's Day bowl matchups from a draft perspective (25:30), showcasing who to watch in the Rose Bowl between Oregon and Wisconsin, the Sugar Bowl between Baylor and Georgia, the Citrus Bowl between Alabama and Michigan and the Outback Bowl between Minnesota and Auburn. Happy New Year!
